Description: Conical foot sherd of Chian, possibly Mature Animal Style or Grand Style, pottery heavy chalice; white slip on exterior, glazed streaky brown with trace of added white band at bottom of foot; reserved underside and edge of foot; inscription on exterior.
Curator's comments: The number '353' is written in pencil on the interior surface of the sherd. Heavy chalices and chalice kraters are found in the Chian Mature Animal Style and Grand Style.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.0645) (phase 2)
